title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 11/04/2022 INC#0088

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0088; 05:35PM; 3133 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T6fgtQ; #BoyleHeights; LAFD Firefighters continue to operate at the scene of this morning's predawn fire that destroyed a one-story commercial building fully involved with fire on firefighters arrival. We are pleased to confirm there have been no responder or civilian injuries reported, as stubborn flames have been accessed and extinguished, and the building's immediate physical hazards abated through the strategic use of specialized LAFD heavy equipment, including the RS3 Robotic Firefighting Vehicle and an LAFD Excavator. Though the building housed smoking products, including a large amount of tobacco, firefighters are not aware of any specific hazard related to smoke from the fire, which was largely extinguished at 3:08 AM. As the burning tobacco naturally contained nicotine, firefighters took efforts to prevent personal contact with contaminants and to contain water runoff, so that it could be serially tested by LAFD, health and environmental officials. Anyone who may have come into contact with water runoff from this fire, is encouraged to wash thoroughly with soap and water, so as to limit any health concerns related to nicotine exposure. LAFD efforts, including a formal fire cause investigation will continue at the scene this evening.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; Dispatched LAFD Units: AR1 AR17 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E1 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E220 E221 E25 E250 E3 E4 E43 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HE2 HR3 JT1 JT2 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA803 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T21 T3 T50 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; - Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0088; 03:08AM; 3133 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UmHTUw; #BoyleHeights; Over 120 firefighters battled the commercial blaze relentlessly for one hour and 33 minutes in defensive mode, utilizing heavy streams including ladder pipes. With the help of RS3's remote firefighting capabilities, the flames were extinguished without injury. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E14 E15 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E220 E221 E25 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HE2 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA803 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T21 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0088; 01:35AM; 3133 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T6fgtQ; #BoyleHeights; Large one-story commercial with fire through the roof. Defensive mode.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E14 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E221 E25 E3 E4 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA803 T1 T10 T11 T2 T21 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1677; 08:57PM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; #PanoramaCity; Firefighters located fire in one unit of the modern apartment building. Ponet doors did their job compartmentalizing the building, allowing residents to shelter in place to avoid smoke exposure. It took 34 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E275 E290 E81 E90 EM14 RA7 RA81 RA881 T39 T75 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1677; 08:36PM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; #PanoramaCity; Four-story modern residential building (bottom level is parking only) with fire in one unit.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E275 E290 E81 E90 RA7 RA81 T39 T75 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1304; 05:25PM; 1452 N Martel Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U0Gxz0; #Hollywood; Firefighters navigated around downed wires to approach the structure, where flames consumed the home. It took 42 firefighters 43 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, without injury. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E27 E35 E41 E82 EM14 RA27 RA41 T27 T29 T35; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1304; 04:42PM; 1452 N Martel Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U0Gxz0; #Hollywood; One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E27 E35 E41 E82 EM14 RA27 RA41 T27 T29 T35; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Fire 11/01/2022 INC#1625

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Fire; INC#1625; 09:42PM; 23120 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3h45V8k; #WoodlandHills; Firefighters quickly extinguished the fires in both vehicles, but, sadly, the two occupants in one vehicle were beyond medical help upon first responders' arrival (less than 5 minutes after time of alarm). The driver of the second vehicle had escaped (no FD extrication needs) and was evaluated by firefighter/paramedics on scene. The patient is in good condition, but is being taken to the hospital as a precaution due to the amount of force of the collision. LAPD Inc #4443. Nothing further. ; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E305 E84 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA105 RA106 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision with Fire; INC#1625; 09:02PM; 23120 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3h45V8k; #WoodlandHills; Two-vehicle collision with fire involved. Sadly, two patients have been declared dead on scene. One additional patient is being treated on scene (unknown age, gender, condition, circumstances).; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E305 E84 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA105 RA106 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Fire - Now Out; INC#1354; 06:16PM; 536 S Clarence St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNmrUO; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters arrived to find several palm trees and rubbish on fire next to a large one-story commercial building, and spreading into the nearby brush. Firefighters quickly divided the tasks between companies, and went to work to contain the fires (tree, rubbish, brush) and protect the structure. It took 30 firefighters 38 minutes (6:54pm) to extinguish the flames, keeping the brush fire relatively small, and protecting all but the top layer of roofing on the commercial building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E209 E25 E4 E9 T9; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange
